title: A Death in the family
creator_credit: James H. Wallace, New Zealand Film Commission, Television New Zealand, Stewart Main and Peter Wells
brief_description: An outstanding dramatisation of a group of gay men nursing a friend dying of AIDS in his final 16 days. This beautifully shot film addresses the private realities of living and loving against the public front of a “horror” disease.
